text: Ivan Stepanovich Utrobin () (March 10, 1934 - June 25, 2020) was a Soviet cross-country skier. He competed during the early 1960s, training at VSS Trud in Moscow Oblast. He earned a bronze medal in the 4 x 10 km event at 1964 Winter Olympics in Innsbruck. Utrobin died on June 25, 2020 at the age of 86.Ivan Utrobin ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet skiers
title: Ivan Utrobin
